attributes.action: Make Monday after the euros final a bank holiday
attributes.additional_details: After the hard 18 months this country has faced it would be very nice for everybody in the country not have to worry about work after the football on Sunday let’s bring it home with happiness and cheer!
attributes.background: The final of the euros 2020 is on a Sunday make the Monday after a bank holiday

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020
